```{r}
library(fpp2)
library(forecast)
ts_Lebron <- read.csv("~/Practice/Lebron-Monthly-Worldwide.csv")
ts_Lebron$values <- ts_Lebron$value 
ts_Lebron <- ts(ts_Lebron$values,start=c(2020,01),frequency=12)
ts_Lebron
plot(ts_Lebron)
ndiffs(ts_Lebron)
tsdisplay(ts_Lebron)
ts_Lebrondiff1 <- diff(ts_Lebron, differences=1)
plot(ts_Lebrondiff1)
tsdisplay(ts_Lebrondiff1)
auto_fit <- auto.arima(ts_Lebron, trace=TRUE, stepwise = FALSE)
auto_fit
attributes(auto_fit)
plot(forecast(auto_fit,h=5,level=c(99.5)))

#Residual Analysis
Acf(auto_fit$residuals)
Box.test(residuals(auto_fit), lag=20, type="Ljung")
plot.ts(residuals(auto_fit))
hist(auto_fit$residuals)
tsdiag(auto_fit)
accuracy(auto_fit)
```
